statements: SELECT * FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Certification A';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Certification%';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(expiration_date, certification_date)) AS avg_duration FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS certification_count FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(*) AS certification_count FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY certification_name;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(DATEDIFF(expiration_date, certification_date)) AS max_duration FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT certification_name, MIN(DATEDIFF(expiration_date, certification_date)) AS min_duration FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY certification_name;
SELECT employee_id, YEAR(certification_date) AS certification_year FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect'
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS certification_count FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING certification_count > 1
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM employee_certifications
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, expiration_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE expiration_date < NOW()
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, (expiration_date - certification_date) AS valid_duration FROM employee_certifications WHERE valid_duration > 365
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_id, CERTIFICATE(certification_name) AS certificate_type FROM employee_certifications
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date, expiration_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Developer%'
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, certification_id FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id WHERE regulatory_compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees LEFT JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM certifications RIGHT JOIN employees ON certifications.certification_id = employees.certification_id;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees INNER JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id ORDER BY certification_name;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id GROUP BY certification_name;
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM certifications;
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(certification_id) AS cert_count FROM employees GROUP BY employee_name;
SELECT employee_name, AVG(certification_id) AS avg_cert_id FROM employees GROUP BY employee_name;
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(*) AS employee_count FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id GROUP BY certification_name;
SELECT employee_name FROM employees WHERE certification_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT certification_name FROM certifications WHERE regulatory_compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id WHERE employee_id = 456;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id OFFSET 5;
SELECT employees.employee_name, certifications.certification_name FROM employees INNER JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;

SELECT employees.employee_name, employees.certification_date, certifications.certification_name, certifications.regulatory_compliance_status FROM employees INNER JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT employees.employee_name, certifications.certification_name FROM employees LEFT JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT employees.employee_name, certifications.certification_name FROM employees RIGHT JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM certifications;
SELECT AVG(certification_id) AS avg_certification_id FROM certifications;
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM employees INNER JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id GROUP BY employee_name;

SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications
SELECT certification_name FROM EmployeeCertifications
SELECT certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications
SELECT expiration_date FROM EmployeeCertifications
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM EmployeeCertifications
SELECT employee_id, certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications
SELECT * FROM Department
SELECT department_name FROM Department
SELECT * FROM EmployeeDepartment
SELECT department_id FROM EmployeeDepartment
SELECT employee_id, department_id FROM EmployeeDepartment
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE certification_name = 'Java Certification'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE department_name = 'IT Department'
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE department_id = 456
SELECT * FROM EmployeeDepartment WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT * FROM EmployeeDepartment WHERE department_id = 456
SELECT * FROM EmployeeDepartment WHERE employee_id = 123 AND department_id = 456
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(certification_name) AS num_certifications FROM EmployeeCertifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(certification_name) > 3;

SELECT e.employee_id, c.certification_name FROM EmployeeCertifications c JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed ON c.employee_id = ed.employee_id JOIN Department d ON ed.department_id = d.department_id JOIN EmployeeCertifications e ON ed.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE d.department_name = 'IT';

SELECT e.employee_id, c.certification_name, c.expiration_date FROM EmployeeCertifications c JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed ON c.employee_id = ed.employee_id JOIN Department d ON ed.department_id = d.department_id JOIN EmployeeCertifications e ON ed.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE d.department_name = 'HR' AND c.expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, COUNT(ed.employee_id) AS num_employees FROM Department d LEFT JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed ON d.department_id = ed.department_id GROUP BY d.department_id;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.certification_name, e.certification_date FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY employee_id ORDER BY certification_date DESC) AS rn FROM EmployeeCertifications) e WHERE e.rn = 1;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.certification_name, e.certification_date, e.expiration_date FROM EmployeeCertifications e WHERE certification_date = (SELECT MAX(certification_date) FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE employee_id = e.employee_id);
SELECT department_id, department_name, employee_id FROM Department d CROSS JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed WHERE d.department_id = ed.department_id;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.certification_name, e.certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications e WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM EmployeeDepartment ed WHERE e.employee_id = ed.employee_id);

SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, COUNT(ed.employee_id) AS num_employees FROM Department d LEFT JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed ON d.department_id = ed.department_id GROUP BY d.department_id HAVING COUNT(ed.employee_id) < 2;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.certification_name, e.certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications e WHERE certification_date >= ALL (SELECT certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE employee_id = e.employee_id);

SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, COUNT(ed.employee_id) AS num_employees FROM Department d LEFT JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed ON d.department_id = ed.department_id GROUP BY d.department_id ORDER BY num_employees DESC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.certification_name, e.certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications e WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM EmployeeDepartment ed WHERE e.employee_id = ed.employee_id AND ed.department_id = 1);
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM Department UNION SELECT department_id, department_name FROM Department ORDER BY department_id;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.certification_name, e.certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications e WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Admin%';

SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, COUNT(ed.employee_id) AS num_employees FROM Department d LEFT JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed ON d.department_id = ed.department_id GROUP BY d.department_id HAVING MAX(ed.employee_id) = 1001;
SELECT AVG(DISTINCT e.employee_id) AS avg_employee_id FROM EmployeeCertifications e;

SELECT department_id, department_name, employee_id FROM Department d JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed ON d.department_id = ed.department_id WHERE ed.employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE certification_name = 'Java Developer');

SELECT department_id, department_name, employee_id FROM Department d JOIN EmployeeDepartment ed ON d.department_id = ed.department_id WHERE ed.employee_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE certification_name = 'Scrum Master');

SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_description FROM certifications;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles;
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM employees JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id;

SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM employees JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id WHERE certification_name = 'SQL';
SELECT role_name, certification_name FROM roles JOIN certifications ON roles.role_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT role_name, certification_name, certification_description FROM roles JOIN certifications ON roles.role_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, certification_name, certification_date FROM employees JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id;

SELECT employee_name, employee_role, certification_name, certification_date, certification_description FROM employees JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id JOIN certifications ON employee_certifications.certification_name = certifications.certification_name WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager');

SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications INNER JOIN employees ON employee_certifications.employee_id = employees.employee_id WHERE employees.employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, role_name FROM employees INNER JOIN roles ON employees.employee_role = roles.role_name WHERE roles.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT certification_name, certification_description FROM certifications WHERE certification_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id NOT IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee_certifications);
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY employee_id DESC, certification_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(certification_name) AS total_certifications FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(certification_name) > 3;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id WHERE employee_name = 'Alice' AND certification_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name IN (SELECT certification_name FROM certifications WHERE certification_description LIKE '%Advanced%');
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT MAX(employee_id) AS max_employee_id FROM employees;
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(certification_name) AS total_certifications FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY certification_name ORDER BY total_certifications DESC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'AWS Certified Developer';
SELECT certification_name, employee_name AS certified_by FROM employee_certifications INNER JOIN employees ON employee_certifications.employee_id = employees.employee_id;

SELECT employee_name, SUM(employee_certifications.certification_name) AS total_certifications FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_certifications ON employees.employee_id = employee_certifications.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name HAVING SUM(employee_certifications.certification_name) > 2;

SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name IN (SELECT certification_name FROM certifications WHERE certification_description LIKE '%Professional%');
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name FROM certifications;
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, certification_description FROM certifications;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM departments;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments;
SELECT department_id, department_name, department_head FROM departments;
SELECT * FROM employee_department;
SELECT employee_id, department_id FROM employee_department;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE hire_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='IT' OR department='Finance';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department=d.department_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ec.certification_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_certifications ec ON e.employee_id=ec.employee_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_department ed ON e.employee_id=ed.employee_id JOIN departments d ON ed.department_id=d.department_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ec.certification_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_certifications ec ON e.employee_id=ec.employee_id WHERE ec.certification_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT certification_id, certification_name, certification_description FROM certifications WHERE certification_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT employee_id, department_id FROM employee_department WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_department ON employees.employee_id = employee_department.employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department_name FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, certification_id FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, ec.certification_name, ec.certification_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN employee_certifications ec ON e.employee_id = ec.employee_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name WHERE e.hire_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(ed.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employee_department ed ON d.department_id = ed.department_id GROUP BY d.department_name;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, c.certification_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN employee_certifications ec ON e.employee_id = ec.employee_id INNER JOIN certifications c ON ec.certification_id = c.certification_id;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name WHERE e.employee_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
SELECT employee_id, department_id, COUNT(*) AS total_certifications FROM employee_certifications GROUP BY employee_id, department_id;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM departments d LEFT JOIN employees e ON d.department_name = e.department GROUP BY department_name;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, c.certification_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN employee_certifications ec ON e.employee_id = ec.employee_id INNER JOIN certifications c ON ec.certification_id = c.certification_id WHERE c.certification_name LIKE '%Java%';

SELECT ed.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM employee_department ed INNER JOIN employees e ON ed.employee_id = e.employee_id INNER JOIN departments d ON ed.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT d.department_name, AVG(e.employee_id) AS avg_employee_id FROM departments d INNER JOIN employees e ON d.department_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY d.department_name;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name ORDER BY e.hire_date DESC LIMIT 10;
